name: Idle Hero TD
description:
In Idle Hero TD - Fantasy Tower Defense, uncover a fantastical world of heroes and monsters! Stop evil creatures from raiding innocent lands! Command a team of heroes to defend the remaining stockpiles at all costs!

In this epic fantasy idle tower defense game, you must defeat monsters to earn resources, tap to unlock and upgrade heroes. Create a team of heroes and place them in strategic positions to defend against an endless swarm of vicious foes!

Your main goal in this Idle TD game is to use your heroes to stop the monsters from reaching the treasure at the end of the maze.

Idle Hero TD - Fantasy Tower Defense Features

Epic Tower Defense:
- Fend off an Orc Horde and Epic Bosses
- Daily missions to complete

Idle TD Gameplay
- Clicker game features to command units with a tap
- Offline gold earnings

Epic RPG
- Fantasy RPG-based world and classes
- PvP Tournament hosted twice a week

Lovers of tower defense games and idle clickers won’t be able to put down this idle RPG. Go on an epic tap quest, explore a fantastic world, battle monsters and defeat tough bosses. Master Your Party in Idle Hero TD - Fantasy Tower Defense! Enjoy it online or offline!
